meanings.sent1: His impotency in the face of danger left him feeling helpless.
meanings.sent2: The impotency of the old engine made it difficult to start.
meanings.sent3: The magician's impotency to perform the trick made the audience chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The impotency of the ruler's commands led to chaos in the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The impotency of the flashlight's batteries left them in darkness.

meanings.definition: Inability to achieve or maintain an erection
meanings.sent1: His impotency caused him distress in his relationship.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed medication to help with his impotency.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about his impotency, making the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: The impotency of the medication disappointed the patient.
meanings.sent5: The man's impotency led him to seek medical advice.

meanings.sent1: The impotency of his arguments failed to convince anyone.
meanings.sent2: The impotency of the law enforcement agency was evident in the rising crime rates.
meanings.sent3: The impotency of the tiny umbrella in the storm was comical.
meanings.sent4: The impotency of the company's marketing strategy resulted in low sales.
meanings.sent5: The impotency of the politician's promises left the voters disillusioned.
